1.0.name: wordpress/spine
1.0.description: Highly customizable mobile resonsive theme. Make it your own by using a live preview to change colors, layouts, background and header images and upload your logo with a click of the mouse. It also looks great out of the box! Built with the Hybrid Core theme framework and the Foundation 4 front end framework.
